text: Les Powell (13 April 1921 – 22 December 1999) was a former Australian rules footballer who played with Fitzroy and Geelong in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * * Category:1921 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Fitzroy Football Club players Category:Geelong Football Club players Category:Newtown & Chilwell Football Club players
title: Les Powell (footballer, born 1921)
